output.sentences: While visiting the exibit, I took a pic of the sign at the museum.
The living room exhibit had older decor to look authentic of the period.
The table in the pool room must have provided a lot of entertainment.
Before we left we saw tiny desks in a bedroom.
My favorite room had glass lamps, and blue walls, and was by far my favorite.
